originalText.text: HOSTILE AND HARASSED by owner over a UPS Pick up. This business should be cancelled ASAP by UPS. This man has a history of acting hostile towards customers. He chased me 1/2 way down the block yelling at me to contact UPS. He wouldn’t stop following me. I have formally contacted UPS upper management. Times are tough and showing excessive aggression is not welcome.

originalText.text: This is one of the worst dry cleaners in the area. DO NOT GO. 3 suits, one dress, and dress shirts lost?! Not only are they always behind with orders and loosing property but they are incredibly rude and careless. Not worth the cheap price- there are many other better choices who are respectful towards you and your property.

text.text: This is one of the worst dry cleaners in the area. DO NOT GO. 3 suits, one dress, and dress shirts lost?! Not only are they always behind with orders and loosing property but they are incredibly rude and careless. Not worth the cheap price- there are many other better choices who are respectful towards you and your property.

originalText.text: We use the wash and fold service as well as the dry cleaner and tailoring. After leaving another nearby business because of rudeness and clothing being ruined, I am happy I walked into this place. The owner is extremely nice and always calls out my name and says hi when I am walking by. He knows my dog as well and kids. I also do UPS drop off here and my packages always get where they’re going quickly.

originalText.text: Came here to pick up my package from UPS and the owner was very nice and organized! I showed him my ID and signed for the package and was in and out in about 5 minutes. He was very careful and methodical about the whole process and I definitely trust him with my packages.

text.text: Came here to pick up my package from UPS and the owner was very nice and organized! I showed him my ID and signed for the package and was in and out in about 5 minutes. He was very careful and methodical about the whole process and I definitely trust him with my packages.

originalText.text: DO NOT GO HERE. Unfortunately, this is the closest UPS pickup location near me. The owner is consistently disheveled and rude, going as far as yelling at my partner for simply showing up and inquiring about a package before it had arrived. I’ve also used as a dry cleaner and had a white dress shirt ruined with stains.
